fields.label: Use Page Builder
fields.name: use_page_builder
fields.instructions: Using the page builder will allow you to select blocks of content. The text in the built-in content editor will be ignored on this page.

sub_fields.label: Block Arrow?
sub_fields.name: block_arrow
sub_fields.instructions: If selected, there will be an overlapping arrow at the bottom of the content block.

fields.label: Hook
fields.name: hook
fields.instructions: Intro text that appears before the post and after the title. It looks so cool, all bold and fancy. Plus, it is a header, which if used properly can be kick butt for SEO, and we all want more views :)
